tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Genuinely nice guy. Class had lively discussion, and even though we covered some pretty personal/controversial issues, people remained civil. Shields is really great at drawing things out of people and getting to the root of issues. A lot of reading, but most of it is interesting and you can get by skimming. You also get to watch movies for class

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  CARING
comments: Professor Shields is one of the best professors at the Claremont Colleges. He cares a lot about his students. He assigns a lot of reading, but chooses books thoughtfully, and overall his classes are low-stress. Go to his office hours and he will make an effort to get to know you. Always very helpful and wants you to succeed!

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SO MANY PAPERS  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Professor Shields is an amazing professor. This guy knows his stuff and cares about his students. I have taken many classes with him and would highly recommend all of them. He carefully chooses readings that are interesting and make you really think. Do not be scared to take his class because of the workload. He will help you through it!

stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  RESPECTED  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Great discussion facilitator, always challenges you to think about a point of view you disagree with. It is difficult to get an A on the papers because you need to really piece together the author\'s argument and come up with something new (it felt like writing a philosophy paper) but the tests are easy and it\'s always fun material to discuss.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Shields is a wonderful professor, he is very engaging and fun to converse with. My only complaint was that he was very reluctant to give out any A grades on papers. It seemed like everyone in my class had the same complaint.

stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Great teacher- always makes time to talk and connect with students. Lots of reading but otherwise manageable workload (exams and papers are easy).

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Very very hard as a GE. Don\'t take him for GE. And he doesn\'t seem to really care about students and help students to improve. A very disappointing class.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: He is a very nice and funny guy to meet with in office hours. I enjoy most of his lectures and find him to be engaging and interesting. That being said, I took this class as a GE requirement and it was EXTREMELY hard. He has a very high standard for excellence, and getting an A is almost impossible. Would only recommend to gov majors

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Shields was a nice guy... kinda weird, but overall a good class, especially considering it was just an intro course. Mostly interesting readings, lectures can sometimes be hard to follow, and he\'s not an easy test grader. But overall a good class.

comments: Don\'t like his class organization because his lecture sometimes is just absurd. A hard grader for sure.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Profess Shields is great. A really nice class, and engaging in lecture. The material is a little dry as it is an intro class, but I would highly recommend taking any class with him!

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Easiest class on the planet. We don\'t really talk about what you would think an intro gov class would but it is an awesome class. Extra-credit movie nights and study guides and lecture style class oh my! Also, I find it extremely impressive that he never comes off a being biased.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Very approachable and interesting teacher. The class discussions were always very engaging, even though it was an 8 AM class. A lot of reading, but through it you learn a lot about yourself and politics. I went to his office hours a lot and I am very liberal and never felt judged. I think he\'s very open-minded. Great prof :)

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: a great teacher and class.topics vary and are unexpected but still interesting despite the large amount of reading.class is all discussion and lecture.few assignments but participation is 30% of the grade.he is an unbiased lecturer but politically conservative and in private discussions can show his bias against liberal students.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Though it was an 8am class, I rarely missed class because the discussions were really interesting. He was an AMAZING discussion leader and always made everyone feel comfortable. I really don\'t like govt but I LOVED this class and he got me excited about American politics. A LOT of reading but so worth it. He\'s such a nice guy and a great prof!

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: With this professor I had a difficult time understanding what it was he was trying to teach us. Instead of the foundations of American government, he taught us mostly about how people communicate within the government, which went against my interests. He\'s now teaching much more to his strengths in an upper level course. NOT good for intro!

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Shields is very nice and is usually open to many perspectives and arguments. Good at leading discussions, which is good because the entire class is discussion-based. One downside: quite a heavy reading load.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Incredibly passionate professor. Really prepares his lectures and tries to get everyone into the discussion. If you want an easy class, find another section. If you want to make sure you\'re getting your tuition\'s worth, take Shields.

comments: great course
